description: This file contains Jest test cases for the React App component, performing smoke tests on UI elements, accessibility, theme toggling, and footer content.

methods.name: test('renders navbar brand/logo scoped to banner')
methods.description: Tests that the navbar logo is rendered inside the banner role, verifying the presence of 'Ocean Pro' text within the header.

methods.name: test('renders hero heading and both CTA buttons')
methods.description: Verifies that the main hero heading and call-to-action links/buttons are present in the DOM.

methods.name: test('dark mode toggle toggles documentElement "dark" class')
methods.description: Tests the dark mode toggle button functionality, ensuring it adds/removes the 'dark' class on the HTML element.

methods.name: test('renders footer copyright and links scoped to contentinfo')
methods.description: Checks for the presence of footer content, including copyright, section headers, links, and social icons.
